title: No. 229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “ for
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance 

Distribution) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 12 June 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (insurance distribution) (amendment) regulation 2020 (2) regulation come operation 12 june 2020

title: No. 229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “ for
heading: 2. The European Union (Insurance Distribution) Regulations 2018 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Insurance Distribution) Regulations 2018 (S.I. 
No. 229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “ for 
not less than €1,300,380 applying to each claim and in aggregate €1,924,560 
per year” for “ for not less than €1,250,000 applying to each claim and in 
aggregate €1,850,000 per year”. 

1 OJ No. L 26, 02.02.2016, p. 19 
2 OJ No. L 301, 22.11.2019, p. 3 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Finance, 

16 June, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [215]
